Name: Balloon Girl
About the game: Balloon Girl is a retro inspired flying adventure game. On a beatiful day balloon girl and her other friends hanging around and suddenly the magic balloons are flying away and are now distributed all over the world. So you need to 'collect them all'. Every level is unique and has his own trick to solve. Sometimes there are more than one way to solve this level - you can explore and figure it out. Ballon Girl Fakts: Explore over 50 challenging and unique levels Choose between 4 Playabble Characters. You can be the Girl, a boy a Dog or even a baby ? Very intuitive and easy gameplay Enemies everywhere Handdrawn Pixel Art with love
